input.sentences: celebrating the 4th of july with friends | the fireworks burst beautifully in the air .
every explosion of light causes a cheer in the crowd below .
the flashing lights in the sky are lighting up the earth below .
these fireworks represent what it means to be an american .
land of the free | happy birthday location !
output.sentences: The fourth of July roles around every year.
My friends always try to persuade me to go with them to see the fireworks but I stay home.
You can see the beautiful sparkling display from a friend's house if they live by the river but I watch it on television--it's just as good to me.
Sometimes there are neighborhood firework displays I can see from my window.
I sit there late into the night until the last gleaming light is extinguished.
